backend/main.mo: Motoko backend managing admin authorization, session initialization, and CRUD for inquiries with upgrade-safe stable storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of concise summaries describing functionality of key frontend files and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining color tokens and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entrypoint loading the React app with Hindi title metadata.
frontend/PREVIEW_VALIDATION_CHECKLIST.md: Pre-deployment checklist detailing preview environment validation steps for admin login, inquiries, errors, and demo fallback behavior.
frontend/PRODUCTION_SMOKE_TEST.md: Production smoke test guide verifying official login flow, admin initialization, and inquiry submission behavior.
frontend/public/404.html: SPA 404 fallback that saves the requested path and redirects to root for client-side routing.
frontend/public/admin/index.html: Admin HTML entrypoint bootstrapping the admin section of the SPA.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling routing, admin access guard, deep-link restoration, and rendering top-level sections with an error boundary.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminLogin: Empty file placeholder for an admin login prompt component.
frontend/src/components/admin/InquiryAct: Provides per-inquiry actions including mark read/unread, delete with confirmation, and bulk export options.
frontend/src/components/admin/InquiryLis: Admin inquiry list with filtering, search, category selection, bulk actions, and per-inquiry operations.
frontend/src/components/admin/OfficialLo: A dialog component handling official login with user ID/password, validation, loading state, and success callback.
frontend/src/components/BrandMark.tsx: Renders a logo image with configurable size and optional styling.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: Catches rendering errors and displays a fallback UI with reset-to-home functionality.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Displays business details, disclaimer text, and footer credits with dynamic year and referral link.
frontend/src/components/InquiryForm.tsx: Provides a validated inquiry submission form with success/error states and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/NavigationBar.ts: Responsive navigation bar with scroll-based styling, section scrolling, and mobile menu support.
frontend/src/components/sections/AdminLo: Empty file with no implemented component.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Renders the business contact details including address, operator, phone, WhatsApp, and email using site content.
frontend/src/components/sections/FAQSect: Displays an FAQ accordion sourced from siteContent with expandable questions and answers.
frontend/src/components/sections/FormSec: Section wrapping and displaying the InquiryForm inside a styled card.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Hero banner showing business intro, call/WhatsApp buttons, and triggers the OfficialLoginDialog for admin login.
frontend/src/components/sections/Mission: Shows the mission and vision text from siteContent inside a styled card section.
frontend/src/components/sections/Service: Renders categorized services from siteContent using cards and accordions for detailed items.
frontend/src/components/sections/WhyChoo: Displays a grid of reasons to choose the business, using icons and text from siteContent.
frontend/src/content/siteContent.ts: Central content configuration defining business info, hero text, mission, services, and other site text data.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminActor.ts: Builds a privileged admin actor using official user ID, performs health checks, and manages session initialization with retry logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminInquiries.ts: Provides admin-side inquiry fetching with selfâ€‘healing on authorization errors and demo fallback when empty.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook handling login, logout, and persisted identity restoration.
frontend/src/hooks/useOfficialLogin.ts: Manages a hardcoded official-login bypass using sessionStorage and custom events for sync across tabs.
frontend/src/hooks/useOfficialUserId.ts: Exposes the stored official user ID and keeps it synced via storage and custom events.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines a mutation hook to submit inquiries through the authenticated or anonymous actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables for light and dark modes with saffron/green accents.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin dashboard page handling official login, admin-actor initialization, inquiry fetching, error states, and refresh/logout logic with various UI states.
frontend/src/utils/adminError.ts: Error utilities for detecting authorization and replica issues, extracting rejection details, and generating readable error messages.
frontend/src/utils/inquiryExport.ts: Exports inquiry data to JSON or CSV, including CSV formatting, timestamp conversion, and type labeling.
frontend/src/utils/navigation.ts: Simple SPA navigation utility that updates history and triggers popstate events.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and session-based parameters, including hash routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme colors, container settings, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project state, goals, admin-login rules, known issues, and deployment/debug context for the site.
